model.dataType
Class CurrentProfileData

java.lang.Object
  model.dataType.CurrentProfileData

public class CurrentProfileData
extends Object

Holds the account information of the current account being used, whether it is one stored in the database or a guest account.

Constructor Summary
CurrentProfileData()
          Creates a new profile with no valid accounts or information.
CurrentProfileData(AccountData account, String profileName)
          Creates a new profile with only one account, and a name.
CurrentProfileData(ArrayList<AccountData> accountData, String profileName)
          Creates a new profile with all valid accounts and a name.

Constructor Detail

CurrentProfileData

public CurrentProfileData()
Creates a new profile with no valid accounts or information. The name is set to a default "empty" name.

CurrentProfileData

public CurrentProfileData(ArrayList<AccountData> accountData,
                          String profileName)
Creates a new profile with all valid accounts and a name. The accounts are passed in as an ArrayList. This list is not checked for validity.

Parameters:
accountData -
profileName -

CurrentProfileData

public CurrentProfileData(AccountData account,
                          String profileName)
Creates a new profile with only one account, and a name.

Parameters:
account -
profileName -
Method Detail

setAccountData

public void setAccountData(ArrayList<AccountData> accountData)
Sets the account data. Changes the entire ArrayList. All old account data is removed.

Parameters:
accountData - An ArrayList of AccountData.

getAccountData

public ArrayList<AccountData> getAccountData()
Gets all account data.

Returns:
An ArrayList of all AccountData in the profile.

setProfileName

public void setProfileName(String profileName)
Changes the name of the profile.

Parameters:
profileName -

getProfileName

public String getProfileName()
Gets the name of the profile.

Returns:
A string of the name of the profile.

setChatbotEnabled

public void setChatbotEnabled(boolean chatbotEnabled)
Sets chatbot. This variable should be checked whenever a message is received to determine whether a chat bot replies to it.

Parameters:
chatbotEnabled -

isChatbotEnabled

public boolean isChatbotEnabled()
Gets whether chatbot is on or not. Check while receiving a message.

Returns:
true if chatbot is on; false otherwise.

accountExists

public boolean accountExists(String userID)
Checks whether the profile already holds an account with the same userID.

Returns:
True if a match is found; false otherwise.

addAccount

public void addAccount(AccountData account)
Adds a new account to the account list. Should throw an exception if a duplicate account is found. Duplicate is defined as: new account has the same userID.

Parameters:
account -

removeAccount

public boolean removeAccount(AccountData account)
Removes an account by the AccountData passed in. If the same object reference is not found, the account is not removed.

Parameters:
account -
Returns:
True is removed, false otherwise.

getAccountFromServer

public AccountData getAccountFromServer(ServerType server)
Finds the first account that matches the ServerType. It is possible for the account list to have more than one account from the same server--this method only returns the first account it encounters.

Parameters:
server - The ServerType of an account.
Returns:
An AccountData object of the first account found, or null if not found.

getAllFriends

public ArrayList<UserData> getAllFriends()
Used to gather friends from all accounts inside of this class.

Returns:
UserData of friends from all associated accounts.

removeFriend

public boolean removeFriend(UserData user)
Searches all accounts for a friend, and removes it upon finding the first occurrence.

Parameters:
user - The UserData representation of the friend to remove.
Returns:
true if removed, false otherwise.

toString

public String toString()
Gets a string representation of the profile. Set to return the name only.

Overrides:
toString in class Object
Returns:
The name of the profile.
